turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Economy of the Iroquois.
turn.1: What kind of economic activity were the Iroquois involved in?
turn.2: The Iroquois have been involved in the steel construction industry for over a hundred years, with many men from the Mohawk nations working on such high-steel projects as the Empire State Building and the World Trade Center.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Inside the reservations, which are sometimes isolated from larger cities, the economic situation has often been bleak.
turn.5: What did they do for the economy?
turn.6: For instance, the U.S. side of the Mohawk St. Regis reservation in northern New York has recently had unemployment as high as 46 percent.
turn.7: What happened after they opened the casino?
turn.8: However, in April of 1999, the St Regis Mohawks opened the Akwesasne Mohawk Casino.
turn.10: It has since been renovated in 2011 and 2012 to enlarge the hotel, amenities and gaming floor.
turn.11: What else did the Iroquois do to help the economy?
turn.12: The casino also employs tribal members and local community members as well.
